original_text: But now she will be so hungry that she will eat her new baby and the afterbirth. She will eat them secretly because there is nothing else for her to eat. She will not share anything with her family because your enemy will be too strong. The soldiers will stop any food from coming into your towns.
korean_text: 자기 다리 사이에서 나온 태와 자기가 낳은 어린 자식을 남몰래 먹으리니 이는 네 적군이 네 생명을 에워싸고 맹렬히 쳐서 곤란하게 하므로 아무것도 얻지 못함이리라

sentences.original_text: But now she will be so hungry
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그녀는 너무나 배고플 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that she will eat her new baby
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 새로 태어난 아기를 먹을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: because there is nothing else for her to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그녀가 먹을 다른 것이 없기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: She will not share anything with her family
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 가족과 아무것도 나누지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: because your enemy will be too strong
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너희의 원수가 너무 강할 것이기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: The soldiers will stop any food
